title: Drinking game contestant falls on his face while competing in alcohol-fueled water slide challenge
text:
When they are told to 'go' one of them slips and fall straight in the water below

This is the hilarious moment a man awkwardly falls down a water slide with a large thud during a drinking game - much to the amusement of his friends.

The unnamed man had attempted to flawlessly slide down the challenge's first obstacle, but after catching his leg on the inflatable slide he quickly became a flop.

Footage of the incident was recorded at a outdoor party in California in July.

In the video, a group of friends are playing the 'Slip n Flip' drinking game, an American invention where competitors race down a water slide before drinking from a cup which they then need to flip over on a table.

As two of the group make their way to the top of the slide, the friends below count down to get them started.

But as the group shout on 'three', one of them accidentally trips and falls flat on his face instead of sliding down.

The unnamed man had attempted to flawlessly slide down the challenge's first obstacle, but after catching his leg on the inflatable slide he quickly became a flop

Crashing with a thud and splashing water in all directions, everyone else at first gasps but quickly begin to laugh.

One person can be heard asking 'oh my gosh, he is ok?'.

The man however doesn't waste any time, and quickly gets up to carry on the game.

He rushes over to a fold-away table to down the contents of a red solo cup, before attempting to flip it over with one hand.
description: The man took the awkward fall down an inflatable waterslide during a 'Slip n Flip' drinking game at a pool party in California in July.
